articles.author: Sean Conlon, Pia Singh
articles.title: Dow jumps 600 points to record as Oracle sparks rush out of AI trade into broader market: Live updates - cnbc.com
articles.description: The S&P 500 fell as Oracle's results reignited fears about high-flying tech stocks.
articles.content: The Dow Jones Industrial Average reached new heights on Thursday as a Federal Reserve interest rate cut followed by disappointing Oracle results prompted investors to move out of high-flying tech sto… [+2773 chars]

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Adobe brings Photoshop, Express, and Acrobat features to ChatGPT - TechCrunch
articles.description: The company on Wednesday said it is adding features from Photoshop, Express, and Acrobat to ChatGPT, letting users ask the chatbot to use these apps to edit images, modify PDFs, or animate elements.
articles.content: Adobe is doubling down on its strategy of using AI to bring more users into its product ecosystem. The company on Wednesday said it is adding features from Photoshop, Express, and Acrobat to ChatGPT,… [+1895 chars]
